Html:
Hi,

When I use the full path on my laptop, dochouse retreives the file no problem. When I use a relative path, it does not find it.

I have tried:
docHouse.Load(@"..\App_Data\Request.txt", false);
docHouse.Load(@"~\App_Data\Request.txt", false);

And both are not working.

ANy suggestion?

thanks

Acheo
